risk_factors: Use of soy sauce (likely containing wheat)
Egg rolls, Spring Rolls, Fried Wontons all contain wheat
Most sauces are likely thickened with wheat flour/cornstarch
recommended_actions: HIGH RISK - Not recommended for severe gluten allergies
Key concerns: Shared fryers, Use of soy sauce (likely containing wheat)
safe_menu_items: Steamed dishes with brown sauce on the side (verify gluten-free soy sauce)
Vegetable Mei Fun or Chow Fun (only if rice noodles are prepared separately and cross-contamination is avoided, and soy sauce is gluten-free)
